name: d3-array
description: Array manipulation, ordering, searching, summarizing, etc.

scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("export var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\";\n");' > build/version.js && rollup -f umd -n d3_array -o build/d3-array.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-array.js -c -m -o build/d3-array.min.js && rm -f build/d3-array.zip
scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && cp build/d3-array.js ../d3.github.com/d3-array.v0.7.js && cp build/d3-array.min.js ../d3.github.com/d3-array.v0.7.min.js && cd ../d3.github.com && git add d3-array.v0.7.js d3-array.v0.7.min.js && git commit -m "d3-array ${VERSION}" && git push && zip -j build/d3-array.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-array.js build/d3-array.min.js
